testcase.brief: Verify use new root-admin user can login AP via console or ssh or telnet(after telnet be enabled)
testcase.description:
Pre-Condition: Default admin user login AP and create a new root-admin user Enable telnet
Test Procedure: New root-admin user login AP via console or SSH or telnet

step.console: -v "admin root-admin aero password 12345" -v "interface eth0 manage telnet" -v "save config" -v "exit"

step.desc: Login AP via telnet in created user name aero/12345
Login AP via SSH in created user name aero/12345
Login AP via console in created user name aero/12345
restore password of default user admin
step.console: -v "admin root-admin admin password aerohive" -v "interface eth0 manage telnet" -v "save config" -v "exit"
